name: conversations.approveSharedInvite
desc: Approves an invitation to a Slack Connect channel

invite_id.desc: ID of the shared channel invite to approve.

target_team.desc: The team or enterprise id of the other party involved in the invitation you are approving.

errors.already_approved: This invite was already approved by this team.
errors.approval_inactive: The approval associated with the invite ID is not active.
errors.approval_not_found: We could not find an approval associated with the invite ID provided.
errors.channel_conversion_in_progress: A channel conversion is in progress
errors.channel_not_found: The channel associated with this invite wasn't found.
errors.invalid_action: This action is no longer valid, e.g., trying to approve an invite that has already been approved.
errors.missing_target_team: The `target_team` parameter is required for this request. The inviting team must provide this argument.
errors.not_paid: The team attempting to approve this invite is not paid and therefore not eligible.
errors.restricted_action: A team preference prevents the authenticated user from creating private channels.
